org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.base

Class BaseIEvaluationScoreCalculator<T extends Model,U extends IEvaluation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.earlystopping.scorecalc.base.BaseIEvaluationScoreCalculator<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of model
    U - Type of evaluation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ScoreCalculator<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationScoreCalculator, RegressionScoreCalculator, ROCScoreCalculator

    public abstract class BaseIEvaluationScoreCalculator<T extends Model,U extends IEvaluation>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreCalculator<T>
    Base score function based on an IEvaluation instance. Used for both MultiLayerNetwork and ComputationGraph
